column5: WELL JUST GOT LAID OFF ON FRI FROM MY CONSTRUCTION JOB FOR THE SEASON AND NOW GOT A JOB WITH DURHAM REGION TESTING THE CHROME LEVELS IN THE WATERS!!  HIT 3 TRIBS TODAY!!! WATERS WERE SO PRIME ON EACH!!!WORKED THEM ALL HARD AND ONLY CAME UP WITH 2 FISH!!! TALKED TO LOTS OF GUYS AND NO ONE WAS GETTIN ANYTHING!!!  I KNOW WE'VE HAD A HECK OF ALOT PRECIP THIS FALL AND THERE WERE SOME HUGE RUNS OF FISH!!! I GUESS EVERYTIME IT RAINS OR SNOW MELTS IT AINT GONNA BRING IN FISH!!!  LOTS OF SNOW COMIN ACCORDING TO THE WEATHER MAN!!!  NICE TO BE BACK ON THE RIVER BUT I GOT TO ADMIT I DO MISS THE LILYPADS LOL
congrats on the new job and an even bigger congrats on the fish
Hope it works out. I'm working on landing the Mattress Tester opportunity at Sleep Country Canada.
congrats i got that same job as of next friday lol........... Maybe we will be testing the same waters lol
Hey Scott.  Bruce here.  Good for you.  Good luck in your new job
WELL I BETTER CLEAR THIS UP  LOL MY WIFE SAYS ITS A JOB HOW MUCH I GO BUT ITS NOT REALLY A JOB!!! TESTING THE WATER FOR CHROME I MENT AS IN STEELHEAD  LOL I WAS JUST PLAYIN AROUND!!!!
It's the best paying job in the world Scott!  Sore arms & a gleam in the eye..hey..where's your float ?
I need a job like that......i think i have the right qualifications....lol.   Nice fish!
As long as you keep that ball hat on you can whip around Durham all day long. You lucky bugger!
MEMBERSHIP HAS ITS BENEFITS BRO  LOL
"NICE TO BE BACK ON THE RIVER BUT I GOT TO ADMIT I DO MISS THE LILYPADS LOL"  you have seen the light my son.............7 months away!!!!!!!
All is right with the world again when CC's steelhead reports are back!  Good going Scott...that's 2 more fish than I've caught in the past month!!!
Great report and pics Scott  I like your new job.... are they still hiring Good job on the chromes.... real nice colors too Thanks for sharing Leechman

Nice CC  I was out yesterday too, Lost one fish and man the waters were prime!  Headin back out right now, gonna be a cold one but I  think the clearing water might be prime at the lower end of a certain river
Nice fish bud .... When I see you with that net, it can only mean one thing !!! I gotta get out there this spring...To much water not enough time  Good to see you got out, Bud ..
